archimate:Folder.name: Gain Commitment to Product Business Plans
archimate:Folder.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Gain enterprise commitment to the product portfolio strategy and individual product plans Extended Description The Gain Commitment to Product Business Plans processes gain enterprise commitment to the product portfolio strategy and individual product plans. These processes include all aspects of identification of stakeholders and negotiation to gain stakeholder approval. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use.
